strings.Ads and trackers blocking list: Listă de blocare pentru reclame și trackere
strings.This Energized System is designed for Un: Acest Sistem Energized este proiectat pentru sisteme ca Unix, primește o listă de domenii care deservesc reclame, urmărirea script-urilor și a malware-urilor din mai multe surse reputabile și creează un fișier host care împiedică sistemul să se conecteze la ele. Atenție, instalarea configurației "Rețele de Socializare" poate face ca aplicațiile sociale, precum Messenger, să se comporte in mod eronat.
strings.Consolidating and Extending hosts files: Consolidând și extinzând fișierele hosts din mai multe surse bine curate. Opțional puteți alege extinderi pentru a bloca Pornografia, Rețele Sociale și alte categorii.
strings.Alternative blocklist with advanced feat: Listă alternativă de blocare cu caracteristici avansate
strings.A blocklist with unique extensions to ch: O listă de blocare cu extensii unice din care să alegeți. Fiți conștient că este mai agresivă și poate afecta unele aplicații sau site-uri. Blochează graph.facebook.com și mqtt-mini.facebook.com. Puteți lua în considerare excluderea lor în secțiunea Activitate, în cazul în care întâmpinați probleme cu aplicațiile Facebook.
strings.A special blocklist containing mobile ad: O listă specială de blocare care conține furnizori de anunțuri mobile.
O listă de blocare pentru filtrarea site-urilor web de înșelăciune. Falsificarea este o practică incorectă bazată pe redirecționarea către site-uri web false, care arată exact ca cele originale, pentru a păcăli vizitatorii, şi pentru a fura informaţii sensibile. Instalarea acestei liste de blocare vă va ajuta să preveniți astfel de situații.
strings.A new and expanding tracker database: A new and expanding tracker database
strings.DuckDuckGo Tracker Radar is a best-in-cl: DuckDuckGo Tracker Radar este un set de date cel mai bun în clasă despre trackere care este generat și întreținut automat prin crawling și analiză continuă. Vedeți informațiile despre autor pentru detalii.
strings.Curated blocklist to block trackers and: Curated blocklist to block trackers and advertisements
strings.This is a curated and well-maintained bl: This is a curated and well-maintained blocklist to block ads, tracking, and more! Updated regularly.
strings.Analyzes privacy concerns in Android app: Analyzes privacy concerns in Android applications
strings.This blocklist is based on The Exodus Pr: This blocklist is based on The Exodus Privacy project, which analyses Android applications and looks for embedded trackers. A tracker is a piece of software meant to collect data about you, or what you do. This is a very small list, so you should also activate one of the more popular lists (like Energized).
strings.Blocks ads, phishing, malware, spyware,: Blocks ads, phishing, malware, spyware, ransomware, scam, telemetry, analytics, tracking (where not needed for proper functionality). Should not interfere with normal apps and services.
strings.A blocklist for ads and tracking, update: A blocklist for ads and tracking, updated regularly
strings.This is a good choice as the primary blo: This is a good choice as the primary blocklist. It's well balanced, medium size, and frequently updated.
strings.A collection of blocklists for various u: A collection of blocklists for various use cases.
strings.These lists were created because the fou: These lists were created because the founder of the project wanted something with a little more control over what is being blocked.
strings.A blocklist based on spam reports: A blocklist based on spam reports
strings.Spam404 is a service that helps online c: Spam404 is a service that helps online companies with content monitoring, penetration testing and brand protection. This list is based on the reports received from companies.
strings.A comprehensive lists to block ads and t: A comprehensive lists to block ads and tracking
strings.hBlock is a list with domains that serve: hBlock is a list with domains that serve ads, tracking scripts and malware. It prevents your device from connecting to them.
strings.A general purpose, medium weight list: A general purpose, medium weight list
strings.This list blocks malicious and harmfully: This list blocks malicious and harmfully deceptive content, like advertising, tracking, telemetry, scam, and malware servers. This list does not block porn, social media, or so-called fake news domains. CPBL aims to provide block lists that offer comprehensive protection, while remaining reasonable in size and scope.
strings.A reasonably balanced ad blocking hosts: Un fisier, rezonabil echilibrat, de host-uri pentru blocarea reclamelor
strings.This is a well known, general purpose bl: This is a well known, general purpose blocklist of small size, updated regularly.
strings.Protect your data & eyeballs from being: Protect your data & eyeballs from being auctioned to the highest bidder. Please choose Light configuration first. If it is not good enough for you, try Pro instead.
strings.This universal list primarily blocks ads: This universal list primarily blocks ads, and mobile app ads. Should not interfere with normal apps and services.
strings.A blocklist based on malware database: A blocklist based on a malware database
strings.A blocklist of malicious websites that a: A blocklist of malicious websites that are being used for malware distribution, based on urlhaus.abuse.ch.
strings.A blocklist from the maker of the adbloc: A blocklist from the maker of the adblocker test
strings.This is the official blocklist from d3wa: This is the official blocklist from d3ward, the maker of the popular adblocker testing website. It is meant to achieve 100% score in the test. Keep in mind, this is a minimum list. You may want to use it together with another blocklist activated. If you wish to perform the test, just visit go.blokada.org/test
